title: Provide 10x Bonus to Early Bounce Event
body:
In order to realign the economics the proposal to provide a 10x bonus to the first line bounce event is hereby made. 
Currently 10:1 + 10x bonus
Next Round 100:1
These would be effectively the same and is readjusted due to market conditions and new expectations of product and alignment. 
The 100:1 will be ran from Jan 1-Jan14 2021 given the bounce event proposal is approved.
author: 0xb4742E8EA65068109DEb8eD6f7D3882caf0F2270
